alert.note: Alert for Bland; Giles; Pulaski (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pulaski, southwestern Giles and northeastern Bland Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over White Gate, or 7 miles west of Poplar Hill, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pearisburg... Poplar Hill... Long Spur... Mechanicsburg... Thessalia... Bane... and White Gate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
